nodes.text: The Kalarba pirates were a group of pirates who were active in the galaxy during the Clone Wars. The Kalarba pirates, alongside many other groups, were supported by the Confederacy of Independent Systems and encouraged by Count Dooku to harass Galactic Republic supply lines.
The Kalarba pirates were mentioned in Rise of the Separatists, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
